body: Sure enough. There's lots of HYPOCRITES in the comment section. How pathetic. We're all here for entertainment, so why would you read something that you HATE? These creatures are the best things to have NTR. OMEGALUL! 🤣🤣
Sorry for that rant but I just had to get that off my chest.

Ok I am just going to come out and say it,this whole story sucks.I am so tired of the played out (girl gets raped by orc,girl falls in love with orc) story trope.I mean could this get anymore cliche? I know that people say that the good guys win all the time in anime but atleast there they make it interesting,its not like the hero beats the main villain in one day.I really wish that hentai arthurs did something new for a change.
Pure Trash should be incinerate not recycled SMH
Och yes more of this. Translate please!
Oh what a nice surprise...I still laugh when I think about how this story ended...just glorious.
the artist should've just continued the story if he really likes it or start a similar series I don't mind, I can always enjoy more of these sweet knight corruption

@miros0511 I fully agree, the I love this artist  drawing style, especially how curvy the female characters are, but the plot for this series specifically is horrible, the ending(last chapter) in particular is the worst part.
the art was good the story was garbage

Epilogue seems kind of random since the previous ending was self-explanatory. Like the author wanted to draw more Erona, but didn't want to keep the series going. Still a good series with good corruption.
